body.p: Match each characteristic to either cardiac or skeletal muscle cells.

response.feedback: Correct. The spindle shape with branches allows these fibers to interconnect in a manner that they wrap around the heart in a spiral fashion.
Incorrect. Branched cells are more suitable for interconnections between cells, and skeletal muscle cells do not interconnect.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.

part.hint: Consider the shape of the heart versus the shape of most skeletal muscles.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The parallel arrangement is common is skeletal muscle where the force generated is typically in one direction.
Correct. The parallel arrangement is common is skeletal muscle where the force generated is typically in one direction.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the shape of cells.

part.hint: Consider the shape of the heart versus the shape of most skeletal muscles.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This describes the connection of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the connections of cells.
Correct. The gap junctions between cells allow the heart to function as a syncytium -– many working as one.

Incorrect. One of the ways that a skeletal muscle can adjust its tension is by only contracting a fraction of all the cells at a time. If the cells were connected through gap junctions, this could not occur.
Incorrect. This describes the connections of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the connections of cells.

part.hint: This type of connection allows the cells to contract as a group.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This describes the connection of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the connection of cells.
Incorrect. The cells of the heart need to contract together to effectively generate blood pressure. If the cells were independent they wouldn’t function as well in this process.
Correct. One of the ways that skeletal muscles can adjust their tension is by only contracting the number of cells (actually motor units) that they need.
Incorrect. This describes the connection of cells.
Incorrect. This describes the connection of cells.

part.hint: Without direction connections, the cells contract independently.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Correct. Cardiac muscle has a very high density of mitochondria. This allows them to maintain ATP levels as long as blood flow is not interrupted, preventing fatigue.
Incorrect. In some skeletal muscle cells the ratio is very high (such as in slow twitch muscle), but in other muscle cells it is much lower.

part.hint: Consider the work each tissue does and whether or not they fatigue.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. This describes the density of mitochondria in the cells.
Incorrect. All cardiac myocytes have a high density of mitochondria. This allows them to maintain ATP levels as long as blood flow is not interrupted, preventing fatigue.

Correct. Skeletal muscle cells vary in their properties for producing and using ATP. Slow twitch muscles do not use as much ATP, but also have high mitochondrial density for producing it, making them more fatigue resistant. Fast twitch muscles use ATP faster, but have a lower mitochondrial density, making them fatigue easily.

part.hint: Consider the work each tissue does and whether or not they fatigue.
